sentence.Network_en: So we set off again, cursing the delay, towards the west.
sentence.Network_cn: 于是，我们一面抱怨延误了时间，一面又朝西出发了。

sentence.Network_en: The coarseness of her cursing amazed the workmen.
sentence.Network_cn: 她骂人的那些粗话让工人们大吃一惊。

sentence.Network_en: His cousin was soon cursing luridly.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的表弟立刻用极其难听的脏话大骂起来。

cursher 破碎机, cursing 仙人诅咒, curshers 破碎机

in English , all capital words are used only when you are very angary , almost equal to shouting or cursing . this way I suggest you never use these capitals again .在英语里，所有大写字母都是当你特别生气时才用的，几乎相当于大喊大叫或者诅咒的时候。我建议你一定不要再用这些大写字母了！

list.abs: 赢者的诅咒（winners curse），假设某一特定的土地（或其他商品及资产）存在很多种投标价格，且投标者们对土地价值的估计基本 …
“资源诅咒”(Resource Curse)是发展经济学中的一个著名命题,其基本理念是丰富的资源趋于阻碍而非促进经济发展。
贼_互动百科 ... 刺客,杀人的人【 murderer】 骂人的字眼【 curse word】 祸害【 calamity; disaster】.
包含骂的词语 | 常用词典 | 中华博物 ... ◆ 毒骂[  curse viciously ] ◆ 叫骂[ shout curses ] ◆ 滥骂[  scurrility ].

entry.def: If you curse, you use rude or offensive language, usually because you are angry about something.

example.ex: I cursed and hobbled to my feet.
example.tran: 我咒骂着一瘸一拐地站起来。

entry.def: If you curse someone, you say insulting things to them because you are angry with them.

example.ex: Grandma protested, but he cursed her and rudely pushed her aside...
example.tran: 奶奶提出抗议，但他辱骂她并把她粗暴地推到一旁。

example.ex: He cursed himself for having been so careless.
example.tran: 他骂自己怎么那么不小心。

entry.tran: (尤指用粗话)抱怨，发牢骚;咒骂
entry.def: If you curse something, you complain angrily about it, especially using rude language.

example.ex: So we set off again, cursing the delay, towards the west...
example.tran: 于是，我们一面抱怨延误了时间，一面又朝西出发了。

example.ex: She silently cursed her own stupidity.
example.tran: 她在心里默默地骂自己愚蠢。

entry.def: If you say that there is a curse on someone, you mean that there seems to be a supernatural power causing unpleasant things to happen to them.

example.ex: Maybe there is a curse on my family...
example.tran: 可能我的家族受到了诅咒。

example.ex: He's been the object of a voodoo curse.

entry.def: You can refer to something that causes a great deal of trouble or harm as a curse .

example.ex: Apathy is the long-standing curse of British local democracy...
example.tran: 冷漠是英国地方民主制度长期以来难以推广的祸根。

example.ex: Summer colds are a terrible curse.
example.tran: 夏季感冒是极其糟糕的事。
